Title: VSTalk
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Instant Messaging within Visual Studio. This extension aims at bringing a sophisticated XMPP world direct into your development environment. 

Features:

  • Communicate with your jabber, facebook, gmail etc. colleagues from Visual Studio.
  • Transfer formatted code.* Copy-paste the piece of code into the chat dialog and that's it.
  • Send environment information such as callstack, debug output.   
  • Supported IM functions: multiple connections, conversation history, contact management, room interactions etc...
  • Straightforward notifications about new messages right through visual studio status bar.
  • No pesky emoticons and sounds.
